name: BonCurvatureEstimator
brief: Curvature estimation for branching decisions (NOT SUPPORTED)

algorithms.name:
Null-Space Curvature for Branching (d^T H_Lag d Projection)

@warning This file is not currently supported (#error directive).

Would compute null-space curvature (d^T H_Lag d) for branching variable
selection, projecting directions onto constraint null space.

**Intended functionality:**
- ComputeNullSpaceCurvature(): Project direction, compute Hessian product
- Handle active bound and constraint detection
- Use linear solvers for projection systems
